tool.name: Synchronize features
tool.command:
tripal sync_features
#if str($types): --types '${types}' #end if
#if str($ids): --ids '${ids}' #end if
--organism '${organism}'
@AUTH@
> $output_log

param.name: organism
param.label: Organism name
param.help: abbreviation or common name as created with the 'Create Organism' tool

param.name: types
param.label: Feature types to synchronize
param.help: Space-delimited list of types of records to be synced (e.g. 'gene mRNA')

param.name: ids
param.label: Feature names to synchronize
param.help: Space-delimited list of names of records to be synced (e.g. 'gene0001 gene0002')
